support.title: Support Center
support.description: Find answers to your questions and contact our team.
support.faq.q1: How do I track my shipment?
support.faq.a1: You can track your shipment in real-time using the 'Tracking' page. Enter the tracking number to see the current location and status of your shipment.
support.faq.q2: How do I change the application language?
support.faq.a2: You can change the application language on the 'Settings' page under the 'Appearance' section.
support.faq.q3: What should I do if my route is blocked?
support.faq.a3: If your route is blocked, our AI system will automatically suggest an alternative route. You will also receive a notification with the details. For emergencies, please contact our 24/7 support.
support.faq.q4: How can I add a new driver to the system?
support.faq.a4: You can add new drivers in the 'Team' section, located in the lower part of the side navigation. You need to have administrative privileges.
support.contact.description: Have a question that's not in the FAQ? Write to us.
support.contact.subject: Subject
support.contact.success: Your message has been sent successfully! Our team will get back to you shortly.
